workflow.name: Transform blog posts to multi-platform content with GPT-4o, Unsplash and Airtable
workflow.description:
### How it works
‚Ä¢ RSS feed monitors your blog for new posts automatically
‚Ä¢ Extracts and cleans full article content from the blog post
‚Ä¢ AI Chain (GPT-4o) transforms content into 5 platform-optimized formats (LinkedIn, Twitter, Instagram, Email, Video)
‚Ä¢ Unsplash API suggests relevant images for each content piece
‚Ä¢ Slack notification alerts content team with preview of all formats
‚Ä¢ Airtable logs everything for content calendar tracking
‚Ä¢ Optional auto-posting to LinkedIn and Twitter (disabled by default)
‚Ä¢ Structured output parser ensures all 5 formats are generated correctly with proper character limits

### Set up steps
‚Ä¢ **Time to set up:** 10-15 minutes
‚Ä¢ Replace RSS feed URL with your blog's feed (common formats: /feed, /rss, /feed.xml)
‚Ä¢ Get Slack channel ID for content team notifications
‚Ä¢ Create Airtable base with 14 columns (Original_Title, Original_URL, Published_Date, LinkedIn_Post, LinkedIn_Hashtags, Twitter_Thread, Twitter_Hashtags, Instagram_Caption, Instagram_Hashtags, Email_Subject, Email_Body, Video_Script, Suggested_Images, Status)
‚Ä¢ Add credentials: OpenAI (GPT-4o), Unsplash API, Slack OAuth2, Airtable Token
‚Ä¢ Replace placeholder IDs in Slack and Airtable nodes
‚Ä¢ Optional: Enable LinkedIn/Twitter auto-posting nodes and add OAuth2 credentials

### What you'll need
‚Ä¢ **OpenAI API** - GPT-4o access for AI content repurposing
‚Ä¢ **Unsplash API** - Free tier available for image suggestions
‚Ä¢ **Slack** - Standard workspace for team notifications
‚Ä¢ **Airtable** - Free plan works for content tracking
‚Ä¢ **Blog with RSS feed** - WordPress, Ghost, Medium, Webflow all supported
‚Ä¢ **LinkedIn/Twitter OAuth2** (optional) - For auto-posting feature

### Who this is for
Content creators, marketing teams, and agencies that want to maximize content ROI by automatically repurposing blog posts into platform-specific content. Perfect for B2B companies publishing regular blog content who need consistent multi-platform presence without manual reformatting.

parameters.content:
## ü§ñ AI Content Repurposing Engine

### üìã Setup Instructions

**Step 1: Configure RSS Feed**
1. Open "New Blog Post" trigger
2. Replace `https://yourblog.com/feed` with your RSS URL
   ‚Ä¢ Common: `/feed`, `/rss`, `/feed.xml`
3. Test in browser to verify XML loads

**Step 2: Configure Integrations**
üîπ **Slack Channel**
   ‚Ä¢ Right-click channel ‚Üí View details ‚Üí Copy Channel ID
   ‚Ä¢ Replace `REPLACE_WITH_SLACK_CONTENT_CHANNEL_ID`

üîπ **Airtable Setup**
   ‚Ä¢ Base ID: Copy from URL ‚Üí `appXXXXXXXXXXXXXX`
   ‚Ä¢ Table ID: Copy from URL ‚Üí `tblYYYYYYYYYYYY`
   ‚Ä¢ Create columns: Original_Title, Original_URL, Published_Date, LinkedIn_Post, LinkedIn_Hashtags, Twitter_Thread, Twitter_Hashtags, Instagram_Caption, Instagram_Hashtags, Email_Subject, Email_Body, Video_Script, Suggested_Images, Status

**Step 3: Add Credentials**
‚úì OpenAI (GPT-4o)
‚úì Unsplash API
‚úì Slack OAuth2
‚úì Airtable Token

**Step 4: Optional Auto-Posting**
üîπ **LinkedIn** (disabled by default)
   ‚Ä¢ Enable "Post to LinkedIn" node
   ‚Ä¢ Organization ID: linkedin.com/company/YOUR-ORG ‚Üí Copy from URL
   ‚Ä¢ Replace `REPLACE_WITH_LINKEDIN_ORG_ID`

üîπ **Twitter** (disabled by default)
   ‚Ä¢ Enable "Post to Twitter" node
   ‚Ä¢ Add Twitter OAuth2 credential

---

### ‚öôÔ∏è How It Works
**RSS** ‚Üí **Extract** ‚Üí **AI Repurpose** ‚Üí **Images** ‚Üí **Slack** ‚Üí **Airtable** ‚Üí **Auto-Post**
‚Ä¢ LinkedIn: 1300 chars, professional
‚Ä¢ Twitter: 4-tweet thread
‚Ä¢ Instagram: Storytelling format
‚Ä¢ Email: Newsletter snippet
‚Ä¢ Video: TikTok/Shorts script

parameters.text:
=üìù *New Content Ready for Multi-Platform Publishing*

*Original Article:*
‚Ä¢ Title: {{ $json.original_title }}
‚Ä¢ URL: {{ $json.original_url }}
‚Ä¢ Published: {{ new Date($json.published_date).toLocaleDateString() }}

*Repurposed Formats Ready:*
‚úÖ LinkedIn Post ({{ $json.linkedin.text.length }} chars)
‚úÖ Twitter Thread ({{ $json.twitter.tweets.length }} tweets)
‚úÖ Instagram Caption ({{ $json.instagram.text.length }} chars)
‚úÖ Email Newsletter Snippet
‚úÖ Video Script ({{ $json.video.duration }})

*Preview - LinkedIn:*
{{ $json.linkedin.text.substring(0, 200) }}...

*Hashtags:* {{ $json.linkedin.hashtags.join(' ') }}

*Suggested Images:* {{ $json.suggested_images.length }} options available

üëÄ Review and approve to publish ‚Üí
